metadata.title: CVE-2017-7614 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: elflink.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.28, has a "member access within null pointer" undefined behavior issue, which might allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via an "int main() {return 0;}" program.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.29-1ubuntu1').
